column5: Great Location, newly remodeled 2 bedroom 2 bath condo on the Comal River sleeps 8. Master bedroom has a queen and day trundle bed (2 singles). Second bedroom has a king sized bed and living room has a queen sized sleeper sofa. Direct river access surrounded by three tubing outfitters this great condo is just a couple blocks off the downtown square.
column8: Comfy Comal River Condo at River Run
